name: cartesiangrid
docstring: A base class for cartesian charts in Recharts.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: The layout of bar in the chart, usually inherited from parent. 'horizontal' | 'vertical'

properties.name: data_key
properties.description: The key of a group of data which should be unique in an area chart.

properties.name: x_axis_id
properties.description: The id of x-axis which is corresponding to the data. Default: 0

properties.name: y_axis_id
properties.description: The id of y-axis which is corresponding to the data. Default: 0

properties.name: legend_type
properties.description: The type of icon in legend. If set to 'none', no legend item will be rendered. 'line' | 'plainline' | 'square' | 'rect'| 'circle' | 'cross' | 'diamond' | 'star' | 'triangle' | 'wye' | 'none' optional

properties.name: is_animation_active
properties.description: If set false, animation of bar will be disabled. Default: True

properties.name: animation_begin
properties.description: Specifies when the animation should begin, the unit of this option is ms. Default: 0

properties.name: animation_duration
properties.description: Specifies the duration of animation, the unit of this option is ms. Default: 1500

properties.name: animation_easing
properties.description: The type of easing function. Default: "ease"

properties.name: unit
properties.description: The unit of data. This option will be used in tooltip.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of data. This option will be used in tooltip and legend to represent the component. If no value was set to this option, the value of dataKey will be used alternatively.
